reportColumns.columnDescription: Current Accounting Period.
The unique number assigned to each loan by Fannie Mae
Unpaid principal balance at the end of the month - the ending point for the snapshot
The amount of the principal and/or interest payment due on the loan for each installment

reportColumns.columnName: Loan Servicing Fee Set Aside Current Amount
reportColumns.columnDescription: Dollar amount set aside to cover servicing fee for reverse mortgage
The current dollar amount of funds from a reverse loan that is set aside to cover the cost of repairs to the property

reportColumns.columnName: First Year Property Set Aside Current Amount
reportColumns.columnDescription: The current dollar amount of funds from a loan that is set aside to cover property expenses during the first year of the loan

reportColumns.columnName: Current Taxes and Insurance Withheld Balance Amount
reportColumns.columnDescription: Current Balance Amount withheld for Taxes and Insurance

reportColumns.columnName: Tax and Insurance Set Aside Current Amount
reportColumns.columnDescription: Amount of funds set aside to pay tax and insurance. If the current reporting period is open, this amount is as of the current date
The total borrowing power available to the borrower for a reverse mortgage product as of the current date
The amount of money available to the borrower at of current date. Equal to the principal limit less

reportColumns.columnName: Line of Credit Reserve Current Amount
reportColumns.columnDescription: The amount available to the borrower form his or her line of credit at the end of the current reporting month

reportColumns.columnName: Net Line of Credit Reserve Current Amount
reportColumns.columnDescription: The net amount available to the borrower from his or her line of credit at the end of the current reporting month.The Net Line of Credit is equal to the Loan Original Line of Credit Amount less any draws, repair and firt year property charges or set-asides
The amount of Mortgage Insurance Premium calculated on the loan for current month
The amount of Interest calculated on the loan for current month
The value of the published financial index that was used as the basis to compute the interest rate for the loan

Rate that is used to calculate the borrower's interest amount for his or her current payment amount. Since interest is calculated in arrears, it is the rate that is used to accrue interest in the prior month (or cycle)
Interest Rate after calculating Rate Change

reportColumns.columnName: Loan Note Rate Next Scheduled Change Date
reportColumns.columnDescription: The next date a rate change may occur. Applies to variable rate loans such as Adjustable Rate (ARM), Graduated Payment Adjustable Rate (GPARM) and Step Rate
Remaining Number of Months for the Scheduled Payments to be paid at the end of the reporting month
This is the description of this column
